getProgressColor().Description: Returns the primary color for the progress bar. If no color was set, transparent is returned.

Returns: A ViewHolder for the Row's View.
Parameters: ViewGroup: The parent View for the Row's view holder.
createRowViewHolder(android.view.ViewGro.Description: Called to create a ViewHolder object for a Row. Subclasses will override this method to return a different concrete ViewHolder object.

getBackgroundColor().Description: Returns the background color. If no background color was set, transparent is returned.

setSecondaryActionsHidden(boolean).Description: Sets the secondary actions to be hidden behind a "more actions" button. When "more actions" is selected, the primary actions are replaced with the secondary actions.

getOnActionClickedListener().Description: Returns the listener for @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Action_E@ click events.

areSecondaryActionsHidden().Description: Returns true if secondary actions are hidden.

setProgressColor(int).Description: Sets the primary color for the progress bar. If not set, a default from the theme will be used.

setBackgroundColor(int).Description: Sets the background color. If not set, a default from the theme will be used.

ClassDesc: A PlaybackControlsRowPresenter renders a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ to display a series of playback control buttons. Typically this row will be the first row in a fragment such as the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#PlaybackFragment_E@. The detailed description is rendered using a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Presenter_E@ passed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRowPresenter#PlaybackControlsRowPresenter_E@. Typically this will be an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractDetailsDescriptionPresenter_E@. The application can access the detailed description ViewHolder from @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRowPresenter#ViewHolder#mDescriptionViewHolder_E@.
